member.name: T:WorldSurveyKit.App_Start.Auth
member.summary:
[Auth.FB] - checks if fb identity is accurate and gets authorations roles from our database based on the fb user id, also checks if api token is valid
Must pass these headers: ApiToken, FbToken
POST http://localhost:44951/api/values HTTP/1.1 User-Agent: Fiddler content-type: application/json Host: localhost:44951 ApiToken:saO1zbN6K1l9WjQiDKpZ FbToken:[....]

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Areas.HelpPage.ApiDescriptionExtensions.GetFriendlyId(System.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Generates an URI-friendly ID for the . E.g. "Get-Values-id_name" instead of "GetValues/{id}?name={name}"

member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Controllers.FileInstancesController.GetNewFileInstances
member.summary: GET's all file instances that belong to the user

members.member:
GET api/FileInstances/5
Gets the FileInstance by ID

PUT api/FileInstances/5
Updates the file instance that is passed in by id

POST api/FileInstances
Creates a new file instance for the user, if the user has access to the file

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Controllers.FileInstancesController.DeleteNewFileInstance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the file instance that is passed in by id

members.member:
GET api/FileInstanceCollection/OrgId
GET's all file instances that belong to an org for reports

GET api/Files/orgsId
Gets all the files that belong to an organization

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Controllers.FilesController.PutFile(System.Int32,WorldSurveyKit.Models.File)
member.summary: Update a file, for example update the published date by passing in the updated_at field, note this is not a patch and all valus must be passed in.

members.member:
POST api/Files
CREATE's a new file for the org passed in

DELETE api/Files/5
DELETE's a file by id

GET api/Options/questionId
GET's all the options for a particular question, a QuestionsId must be passed in

POST api/Options
Creates a new option for a question Security - Must be org admin

DELETE api/Options/5
Deletes an option for a question Security - Must be org admin

GET api/OptionCollection/OrgId
GET's all the options for all the questions in an org Security must be org user

GET api/Orgs
GETs the orgs where you are admin, if your a sys admin then it gets all the orgs

GET api/Orgs/5
GETs data about an org by id

PUT api/Orgs/5
UPDATE's the orgName if your an admin, currently not in use and returns null

POST api/Orgs
CREATEs a new org, the person who adds it is automatically the admin, only sys admins can add an org

DELETE api/Orgs/5
DELETEs an entire organization, only a sys admin can do this

GET api/OrgUserMapping/5
GET's all the users from the orgID that is passed in

PUT api/OrgUserMapping/318
UPDATES a user by his OrgUserMapping Id that is passed in. You could use this api to make a user an admin. Can be used for partial updates

POST api/OrgUserMapping
CREATE's a new user for an org

DELETE api/OrgUserMapping/5
DELETE's a user from an org by passing in the id primary key from the OrgUserMapping Table

GET api/Questions/id
GET the data about a question by id

PUT api/Questions/questionId
UPDATE's a question. Order logic: -1 = make order first, -2 = no change in order, -3 = make order last, Anything else is the questionId the current question should go after

POST api/Questions
CREATE's a new question

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Controllers.QuestionsController.DeleteQuestions(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete's a question from a file, re-orders all the questions in a file it also does a manual cascade and deletes all responses related to this question

members.member:
GET api/QuestionCollection/fileId
GET's all the questions in a file, must be org user

GET api/UQuestionCollection/OrgId
GET's all the questions in all the files in an org, must be org user

GET api/QuestionLookup/questionId
Pass in the question ID, get the file Id that it belongs to

GET api/Responses
GET's all the responses for a user by fbtoken passed in

GET api/Responses/5
GET's all the responses based on the id passed in. Security - must be the user or OrgAdmin (HasFileInstanceAccess())

PUT api/Responses/5
Updates a responses Security - must be the user or OrgAdmin

member.name: M:WorldSurveyKit.Controllers.ResponsesController.PostResponses(WorldSurveyKit.Models.Responses)
member.summary: Creates a response to a question Security - must have access to the question

members.member:
DELETE api/Responses/5
Deletes a response to a question. Security - must be the user or OrgAdmin

GET api/RespsonseCollection/orgId
GET's all the responses for an org

GET api/RespsonseCollection/fileInstId
GET's all the responses for a fileInstId

GET api/Users
GET's all of the users in the system

GET api/Users/5
GET's all the information about a user by ID

PUT api/Users/5
UPDATE's user information like the users Name, defaultOrg, and isSystemAdmin You must be a system administrator to use this

POST api/Users
CREATE's a new user

GET api/whomai
Gets the users ID , FB ID, and user's orgs

PUT api/whomai
Updates the defaultOrg for the user
